mapper.select: SELECT id, record_date, sleep_time, wake_time, total_minutes, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag FROM sys_sleep_record WHERE del_flag = '0' AND record_date BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} AND create_by = #{username} ORDER BY record_date ASC

SELECT id, record_date, sleep_time, wake_time, total_minutes, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag FROM sys_sleep_record WHERE del_flag = '0' AND record_date = #{date} AND create_by = #{username} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_sleep_record (record_date, sleep_time, wake_time, total_minutes, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag) VALUES (#{recordDate}, #{sleepTime}, #{wakeTime}, #{totalMinutes}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, NOW(), #{updateBy}, NOW(), #{delFlag})
